title: ImageWare Systems Showcases GoVerifyID at AirWatch Connect 2015
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: ImageWare Systems, Inc. 
SAN DIEGO, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 09/17/15 -- ImageWare Systems, Inc. (OTCQB: IWSY), a leader in mobile and cloud-based multi-modal biometric identity management solutions, is showcasing GoVerifyID , its patented mobile biometric user authentication solution, at AirWatch Connect 2015 on September 22-23 in Atlanta, booth #306. AirWatch Connect, the leading event for enterprise mobility, connects attendees to the people, tools, and technologies to drive innovation across their enterprise. 
AirWatch ® is the global leader in enterprise mobility management (EMM), providing business mobility solutions for every device, operating system and mobile deployment. ImageWare is the leader in cloud-based multi-modal biometric user authentication. When used together, GoVerifyID and the AirWatch by VMware Enterprise Mobility Management Suite provide unparalleled protection for securing access to mobile devices, apps and data, as well as VPN connections. The combined solution will enable security and privacy while working with BYOD and corporate-provided equipment. 
ImageWare provides enterprises the following solutions to secure a user's identity with their biometrics and to simplify the user's experience. GoVerifyID ® - the industry's only multi-modal biometric user authentication solution that verifies a user's identity for granting access to IT systems and/or physical sites and for authorizing transactions in real-time via mobile devices. GoMobile Interactive ® (GMI) - the server side of GoVerifyID, GMI is a biometric-enabled mobile messaging platform that provides interactive messaging that compliments your existing business processes. IWS Biometric Engine ® - a real-time, high-performance, cloud-enabled, multi-modal biometric database that delivers unmatched performance and scalability. It supports massive populations and petabytes of identity data; it is software and hardware agnostic. 
ImageWare is the only biometric identity management company in the market capable of supporting virtually any biometric modality, offering multi-biometric fusion, and securely storing and matching biometric data in the cloud anonymously. It biometrically verifies push messaging for mobile devices. This product model represents next-generation user authentication, delivered with IWS' portfolio. 
"We believe that biometrics should be situational -- that is, people pick their preferred biometric modality in different situations. Our GoVerifyID solution replaces the password with the biometrics of your choice, enables authentication via a mobile device, and provides the ultimate security and a much-simplified user experience," says Jim Miller, Chairman & CEO of ImageWare. "We are thrilled to have this opportunity to showcase our product at AirWatch Connect. We look forward to bringing GoVerifyID to AirWatch's EMM customers around the world." 
To learn more about GoVerifyID, visit: http://iwsinc.com/products/goverifyid/ . 
About ImageWare Systems, Inc. ImageWare Systems, Inc. (OTCQB: IWSY) is a leading developer of mobile and cloud-based identity management solutions providing biometric, secure credential, and law enforcement technologies. Scalable for worldwide deployment, ImageWare's patented biometric product line includes a multi-biometric engine that is hardware and algorithm independent that enables the enrollment and management of unlimited population sizes. The company's identification products are used to manage and issue secure credentials, including national IDs, passports, driver's licenses, smart cards and access control credentials. ImageWare's digital booking products provide law enforcement with integrated mug shots, fingerprint live scans, and investigative capabilities. 
ImageWare is headquartered in San Diego, CA, with offices in Portland, OR, Washington, D.C., Mexico, and Ottawa, Ontario. For more information about ImageWare Systems, visit www.iwsinc.com .
